--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"Practitioner","id":"fc7fed26-7022-4647-8e32-0e1778653df8","identifier":[{"system":"http://www.acme.org/practitioners","value":"23"}],"active":true,"name":[{"family":"Careful","given":["Adam"],"prefix":["Dr"]}],"address":[{"use":"home","line":["534 Erewhon St"],"city":"PleasantVille","state":"Vic","postalCode":"3999"}],"qualification":[{"identifier":[{"system":"http://example.org/UniversityIdentifier","value":"12345"}],"code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0360/2.7","code":"BS","display":"Bachelor of Science"}],"text":"Bachelor of Science"},"period":{"start":"1995-01-01T08:00:00+08:00"},"issuer":{"display":"Example University"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:18.814+08:00"}}'

javascript Axios

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether the practitioner record is active

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postalCode specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description: A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: communication
parameters.description: One of the languages that the practitioner can communicate with

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: A portion of the family name

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Gender of the practitioner

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: A portion of the given name

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A practitioner's Identifier

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description: The value in any kind of contact
